name: The Department Of Happy Endings
description:
The Department of Happy Endings

hi!!

welcome to THE DEPARTMENT OF HAPPY ENDINGS! my name's THE MANAGER, and i'll be your guide. :-)

this game was made by ROUGE TOUATI-EVANS as his final project for YEAR 0 ANIMATION at UCA! wow! all the art + writing is his. if the jokes aren't funny, it's because he wrote them at 3am. now THAT'S time management!

this game was also made in TWINE, so the webpage is totally SELF CONTAINED. it also contains a lot of GIFS, which tend to have LARGE FILE SIZES, so this game is best played with a good internet connection. that way you can see my face ALL THE TIME!

this is also a DEMO which means THREE THINGS:

  1. it is, and will always be free (but we love donations!)
  2. it is pretty short, and we would love to have the chance to make it longer! and better!
  3. it is FULL OF GLITCHES!! graphical ones, text ones, other ones we didn't even KNOW about yet! so if you find some we'd love to be told so we can update it :)

if you enjoy playing the game, please let us know!! and if you make games and think this is pretty nifty? well, rouge is always looking for cool work :-)
